subject: NCAA Basketball Tournament (Men)
Basketball
lead_paragraph: The last time Tennessee faced Ohio State in the N.C.A.A.  tournament, in 2007, the Buckeyes had Greg Oden dominating inside and Mike Conley Jr. making sure everything flowed smoothly.
snippet: The last time Tennessee faced Ohio State in the N.C.A.A.  tournament, in 2007, the Buckeyes had Greg Oden dominating inside and Mike Conley Jr. making sure everything flowed smoothly.
